attributes.action: ban exploitation by companies using overseas call centres
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Large businesses such as banks now utilise overseas call centres to cut costs.  However the staff used are paid extremely low wages and do not have adequate training to meet the needs of us, the customer. This results in us spending more of our money as these companies generally use 0845 numbers which they then make money from
